snippet.title: NecroBoy : Path to Evilship - trailer
snippet.description:
You are NecroBoy, the greatest Necromancer of all time! Or at least, you aspire to be. Bring your minions back to life and order them to do everything for you! Except maybe the thinking part...

NecroBoy : Path to Evilship is a puzzle game about a young necromancer aiming to become the greatest Lord of Evil! Using his dark powers, he’s bringing his NecroMinions back to life to do his bidding and venture forth into the crypt of his infamous hero, NecroMan!

You can follow for more info when the game will have a store page (steam, itch.io, etc)
https://www.facebook.com/gaming/chillinwolfgames
https://twitter.com/wolf_chillin

Music : Nicolas KERBOURC'H - https://soundcloud.com/kerchus
Logo NecroBoy: Arthur Jacob-Cavarec - https://www.behance.net/ArthurJC
